CustomField.formula: IF( Opportunity__r.Plan_Assets__c <= 1000000, 750, IF( AND( Opportunity__r.Plan_Assets__c > 1000000, Opportunity__r.Plan_Assets__c <= 5000000), 1275 , IF( AND( Opportunity__r.Plan_Assets__c > 5000000, Opportunity__r.Plan_Assets__c <= 25000000), 2050, IF ( AND ( Opportunity__r.Plan_Assets__c > 25000000, Opportunity__r.Plan_Assets__c <= 100000000), 3050, IF ( AND ( Opportunity__r.Plan_Assets__c > 100000000, Opportunity__r.Plan_Assets__c <= 250000000), 4880, IF ( Opportunity__r.Plan_Assets__c > 250000000, (5000 + (((Opportunity__r.Plan_Assets__c-250000000) / 50000000)*750)), 0 ))))))
CustomField.label: FID Base Rate
